You can edit the window size to whatever you want in the settings.cfg file. Look for something like:

SCREEN_RESOLUTION_WIDTH = 1440

SCREEN_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT = 900

Set the numbers to what you think appropriate.
If I remember right, it only works if its a sound ratio to one of the implemented resolutions like 16:9 or similar but I might be mistaken.
Please do mind that setting very low resolutions can cause UI or other graphical problems
